title: 237: Spirit Hacking + Shamanism For The People with Shaman Durek
itunes:title: 237: Spirit Hacking + Shamanism For The People with Shaman Durek
description:
We all have the ability to change our state and bring forth guidance— and it takes talking to the part of yourself that knows. In this episode, I sit with my good friend Shaman Durek to discuss his latest book Spirit Hacking and how you can begin spirit hacking at home. We also discuss why shamanism is all about the WE and we must come together as one for the world to truly be healed.

Receive Shaman Durek and I’s “Awaken Your Powers Masterclass” exclusively by joining Rose Gold Goddesses, YOUR sacred sisterhood collective with content, community and oh so much more — join the waitlist at rosegoldgoddesses.com

Connect with Shaman Durek @shamandurek and check out his new book Spirit Hacking.

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Banyan Botanical’s brand-new and super tasty Turmeric Milk Mix includes ashwagandha and other supportive herbs for digestion, circulation, and more. I want you to try it!

Get 20% off my favorite products at banyanbotanicals.com/sahara.

Get your own Comrad Socks and get 20% off at comradsocks.com/sahara with coupon code "sahara"

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
